##Data
Example VCF of sample HG001 using GRCh38 human genome reference from Genome in a Bottle project.

###vcf to table
gatk VariantsToTable -V Batch1-gatk-haplotype-annotated.vcf.gz -F CHROM -F POS -F REF -F ALT -F FILTER -F QUAL -F QD -F FS -F SOR -F MQ -F MQRankSum -F ReadPosRankSum -O /home/alihh/HG001_GRCh38.table

##Package
```{r, echo=FALSE}
valid_package_name("vcfqc")
available_on_cran("vcfqc")
available_on_bioc("vcfqc")
available_on_github("vcfqc")
```
